Random.random() (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xc36cc0abd32ffa79798d420ce425f1035a5a243d-CryptoWizardz.sol#1309-1311) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),block.timestamp,msg.sender)) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0xc36cc0abd32ffa79798d420ce425f1035a5a243d-CryptoWizardz.sol#1310)
